Articles.Content:
So now i had my first chance to try out the new SP+ Parts from Porkjet (big thanks) for a bit bigger SSTO.

I have no name for it, so here it is: DOWNLOAD

Edited October 30, 2014 by 9t3ndo

That is not only cool as I already said, the rear spikes look suspiciously like a rear-facing landing gear for VTOL landings on airless moon. Is that coincidence or design, I wonder? Because if it is coincidence, you should totally rework it so it is part of the design.

Rune. For name, I'd call it Valkyrie. I think that's what the ship in "Titan A.E." was called, and it reminds me a bit of it.

"You must spread some Reputation around before giving it to 9t3ndo again."

Dang it. This is the best use of structural air intakes I have seen yet!!!

That is not only cool as I already said, the rear spikes look suspiciously like a rear-facing landing gear for VTOL landings on airless moon. Is that coincidence or design, I wonder? Because if it is coincidence, you should totally rework it so it is part of the design.

Rune. For name, I'd call it Valkyrie. I think that's what the ship in "Titan A.E." was called, and it reminds me a bit of it.

this possibility, I noticed not at all...

but first, it was just design and had no functionality like all my crafts -> look over function...
Absolutely spectacular. Best use of the SP+ parts I've seen. Just amazing.
thanks for the great feedback guys

Love your intake designs, very aesthetically pleasing, will be adding this beauty to my sph, look forward to seeing more of your designs man.

Edit:

Is it made for FAR by any chance?

i am having trouble getting it off the run way in the stock aero

Edit:

oo nvm i got it, i was just pitching too much

Edited October 30, 2014 by Roflcopterkklol

This spaceplane looks so futuristic and sci-fi like! I like the look of it and how you angled Kronal Vessel Viewer (i use this mod too but it stutters) to take those "sketches".

Edited October 30, 2014 by deepspacecreeper
sic-fi --> sci-fi (see quote by another user below then u will understand)

Love your intake designs, very aesthetically pleasing, will be adding this beauty to my sph, look forward to seeing more of your designs man.

Edit:

Is it made for FAR by any chance?

i am having trouble getting it off the run way in the stock aero

Edit:

oo nvm i got it, i was just pitching too much

yeah it's not the best acrobatic airplane ^^

This spaceplane looks so futuristic and sic-fi like! I like the look of it and how you angled Kronal Vessel Viewer (i use this mod too but it stutters) to take those "sketches".

i surched for this plugin for 20 minutes in the forum because i don't anymore know how it was named... finally i get on kerbal stuff an there was it featured >.< the best plugin ever made for ksp in my opinion

i surched for this plugin for 20 minutes in the forum because i don't anymore know how it was named... finally i get on kerbal stuff an there was it featured >.< the best plugin ever made for ksp in my opinion

KVV is not my #1 but it is a must-install for me. One of my top 5. KW, MJ and KER and KAC are the other 4.

Looks suspiciously like this.

Any inspiration from the Redeemer here or no?

Looks suspiciously like this.

....

Any inspiration from the Redeemer here or no?

You got me ^^'

Yes Star Citizen is a great inspiration for me in combination with debianart.

This thing is just amazing. And its design is incredible!

9t3ndo, your SSTO is my favourite now
i see youre O2-VTOL's - that are my favorites. I love C&C Tiberium Sun and youre designs looks similar.
Thanks for all the Rep guys
I really like that design. However, it was only with it that I understood what means "flying brick".
